With the avatar currently at (6, 9) and no movement taking place previously, I will initiate movement to avoid potential threats from nearby enemies and keep the avatar mobile for future actions.

I will move the avatar one step to the left to position it away from the center and potentially create some space from any threats.

``` Action:1 ``` 

This action to move left should help reposition the avatar while adhering to the strategic need for movement and maintaining distance from enemies. I expect this will enhance my ability to react and aim at enemies effectively in subsequent turns.
